reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: very impressive architecture, beautiful cosy lobby bar -unfortunatelly there was a large t.v always on.
reviews.title: don't expect much but definatelly the best in the area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: restaurant very nice with tasty food and beautiful views
reviews.title: Good choice

reviews.text: very friendly and rather professional staff
reviews.title: NOT IN THE VILLAGE

reviews.text: rooms -we had a two level suite-good in size with plasma t.v. ,fully stocked mini bar, wi-fi connection, hydromassage bathtub and plenty of bathoom amenities (they had toothbush/toothpaste among other things which is rare in greek hotels), slippers , bathrobes but were very small.
reviews.title: Great place at a landscape of Voras mt and warm welcome at Agios Athanasios

reviews.text: there was also a fire place with plenty of woods which were replaced every day.
reviews.title: A beautiful elegant hotel. Must visit, especially in winter.
